title: March Madness Day Two
author: VD
content_html: Well, so much for the Bison. The third time wasn’t the charm. But Day One wasn’t a bad one for upsets, as it goes. It was nice to see Mr. Pitino sent home early.
content_text: Well, so much for the Bison.  The third time wasn’t the charm.  But Day One wasn’t a bad one for upsets, as it goes.  It was nice to see Mr. Pitino sent home early.
